text: Léo de Almeida Neves (22 March 1932 – 2 November 2020) was a Brazilian politician, economist and lawyer. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1967 to 1969 and again from 1983 to 1987. He was born in Ponta Grossa, Brazil. De Almeida Neves died on 2 November 2020 at a São Paulo hospital from bowel obstruction, aged 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian economists Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Politicians from Paraná State
title: Léo de Almeida Neves
